1683510.name: Runes of Avalon 2
1683510.description: Enter the once magical, mystic empire of Avalon, now clouded by the evil Morganna`s dark spells. After defeating Morganna in an intense magical battle, Evelyne, Avalon`s protector, must use her Rune Magic to cleanse the land. Help her complete the mission by matching 3 or more Runes of the same kind, finding new locations, spells and challenges. Runes of Avalon 2 ist a captivating match3 puzzle game that will take you to an enchanting world you won`t soon want to leave.
1683510.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
